snippet.title: Morbid: The Lords of Ire | Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
From the makers of Morbid: The Seven Acolytes... experience another bloody disgusting take on the souls-like genre with unnerving aesthetics, abysmal monsters and gore galore as you set out to defeat the Lords of Ire. 

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2171560/Morbid_The_Lords_of_Ire

Follow Still Running and Morbid on social media:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/StillRunningDEV , https://twitter.com/MorbidTheGame
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@stillrunningdev?lang=en
